phrase.item: In this busy and unfair world,
all my hope is in you, Mawla [Imam of the time]
I am a blind creature
All my hope is in you, Mawla.
The people of the world are holding the earth [wealth],
There is no one left who can hold their faith.
Children grow angry at fathers,
All my hope is in you, Mawla.
It is clear the world is changing.
The devil is moving around our heads,
and he is walking around door to door.
All my hope is in you, Mawla
Oh, dear Shah Karim [Aga Khan IV], feel for us,
bring together your followers.
Make the people of Wakhan happy.
All my hope is in you, Mawla
Oh, I have in this world only, Shah Karim
Oh, my only guide is Shah Karim.
Oh, my king is only Shah Karim.
Oh my beloved Shah Karim.
Oh I am unaware of my faith
Oh I have left here without wings like a bird.
Oh the devil is walking around me.
Oh, my beloved Shah Karim.
Oh, the devil has become strong in me
Oh, pushing me to go out of my way.
Oh, your light brightens my path
Oh, our beloved Shah Karim
Oh, I am in need of you, Shah Karim.
Oh, you are our caretaker.
Oh, you are my reasons, Shah Karim.
Oh my beloved, Shah Karim.
Oh, may life go well.
Oh, may each human finds their path.
Oh, you are showing the further path.
Oh, our beloved Shah Karim.
Oh, is there success in us,
Oh, whether we are worth of our faith.
Oh, whether we are in love in God's love.
Oh, our beloved Shah Karim.
Oh, give me strength and success in "Namaz" [the time of prayer].
Oh, may you be in agreement with me.
Oh, I wish to see you again and again.
Oh, our beloved Shah Karim.
Oh, if I will be asked in the grave,
Oh, what would I say, the lost and blind.
Oh, I know it will be challenging for me to answer.
Oh, our beloved Shah Karim.
Oh, Aziz is my name and Majnun is my nickname.
Oh, Wakhan is my homeland and my identity.
Oh, in my grave your name will be a solution for me.
Oh, our beloved Shah Karim.
Oh, I call God's name in the sky.
Oh, I am talking about our current life.
Oh, first call God's name, not to get lost.
Oh, I am telling you the truth.
The real world is the other one, this world is just a test.
Oh, we are here only as guests.
Oh, give me strength to reveal you.
Oh, I am speaking my faith and belief.
Oh, dear god, my dreams came true.
Oh, I long for when I was young.
Oh, Wakhan my homeland and my Wakhi songs
Oh, I call myself Aziz from Wakhan.
